name: Breastplate of the Chromatic Flight
tooltip:
Breastplate of the Chromatic FlightLevel 60

To forge the Breastplate of the Chromatic Flight, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':

1 Chromatic Carapace.

10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.

10 Blood of Heroes.

10 Frayed Abomination Stitchings.

Requirements:
- Chromatic Carapace
- Brilliant Chromatic Scale x 10
- Blood of Heroes x 10
- Frayed Abomination Stitching x 10
